title: Grab struggles on Southeast Asia’s heated ride-hailing market
dc:creator: Arno Maierbrugger
description:
Singapore-headquartered Grab, a ride-hailing-turned-e-commerce group and once Southeast Asia’s most valuable startup, is falling behind Indonesian competitor GoTo in the public financial markets. The downturn comes as Grab struggles to gain ground against its rival, particular on the latter’s populous
